text: KCAP may refer to: * KCAP (AM), a radio station (950 AM) licensed to Helena, Montana, United States * KCAP (defunct), a former radio station (1340 AM) licensed to Helena, Montana, which operated from 1949 to 2014 * KZMT, a radio station (101.1 FM) licensed to Helena, Montana, United States, which used the call sign KCAP-FM from 1975 to 1984
title: KCAP
